SummaryEnglish: The anime depicts the overly hyper daily life of the 765Pro idols of The Idolmaster and mysterious creatures named Puchidoll who somewhat resemble the idols.

1.SummaryEnglish: Episode 0 of the anime adaptation of Puchimas! -Petit iDOLM@STER- manga, bundled with the December 2012 issue of Dengeki Maou magazine.

2.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 1: Wonderful Days
2.SummaryEnglish:
Extra episodes of bundled with Blu-rays and DVDs and the limited edition 5th manga volume.

Episodes follow a choose-your-own-adventure format. The full story is three episodes in total, with four versions of the second episode that follow different groups of idols or the producer. In all four versions, the first and third episodes remain the same.

3.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 2-1: Kimyou na Hokora

4.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 2-2: Attsui naa

5.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 2-3: Ifuu Doudou

6.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 2-4: Idol da Mono

7.TitleEnglish: Puchimas!: Petit Idolmaster Special - World 3: Itsumo Issho

8.SummaryEnglish:
Takane does not want to put the kotatsu away, even though it's spring. This leads to a huge court battle led by the Producer and Takanya, on whether the kotatsu should be taken away or not.

Extra episode bundled with the limited edition of the 6th manga volume.

10.TitleEnglish: A Deserted Island for Some Reason

20.TitleEnglish: Birds of a Feather Flock Together

30.TitleEnglish: How Did I End Up In Egypt?

50.TitleEnglish: A Battle of Life and Death

52.TitleEnglish: Why Did It Come To This?

53.TitleEnglish: Companionship In Travel, Compassion In Life

60.TitleEnglish: Is This As Far As We Go?!

64.TitleEnglish: Birds Of A Feather Flock Together

1.SummaryEnglish: In a bizarre retelling of Momotaro, Haruka-san and her faithful companions go to NEET Island to try and convince P-Taro to get a job.

2.SummaryEnglish: Producer attempts to call the office late at night, with only Yukipo, who can't speak, able to listen seriously.

3.SummaryEnglish: On her birthday, Haruka is shocked to find a robot duplicate of her has taken her place in the office.

4.SummaryEnglish: Haruka becomes awed by Makochi's cuteness whilst trying to come up with a new radio segment.

5.SummaryEnglish: Yukiho hosts a radio show where she receives a lot of curious questions from a certain listener.

6.SummaryEnglish: Io goes on a forehead beam rampage in the office, but Iori can't find it in her heart to punish her.

7.SummaryEnglish: Chihaya and Chihyaa's night at the karaoke is somewhat hindered by Haruka, Takane, and their Puchidols.

8.SummaryEnglish: Afu, Chibiki, Koami, and Komami have a staring contest with each other whilst Chicchan notices something under the couch.

9.SummaryEnglish: Chicchan and PiyoPiyo are sick with a cold, receiving visits from the other Puchidols.

10.SummaryEnglish: Io, Yayo, and Chibiki try to stay awake whilst watching over Yayoi's house.

11.TitleEnglish: Sometimes You Just Have To Relax
11.SummaryEnglish: Ritsuko, Hibiki, Yayoi, Ami, and Mami, along with Chibiki, Haruka-san and Takanya, go to a hot spring inn.

12.SummaryEnglish: After Takane and Azusa drag Chihaya and Iori with them to a hot spring trip, Chihya becomes eager to join them.

13.SummaryEnglish: Kotori manages another group as they go to the hot springs for a photo shoot.

14.SummaryEnglish: Producer shows up at the hot spring inn just as all the idols have finished their fun.

15.SummaryEnglish: When it becomes apparent that Makochi has gained a lot of weight due to Makoto spoiling her, Azusa puts her on an exercise routine.

16.SummaryEnglish: Yukipo revels in her newly acquired ability to talk, but finds noone listens to her regardless.

17.SummaryEnglish: Ritsuko works hard whilst the other idols and Puchidols take it easy.

18.SummaryEnglish: Kotori spends some time with the Puchidols before getting lectured by Piyo Piyo.

19.SummaryEnglish: Chicchan has a few of her weaknesses exposed.

20.SummaryEnglish: Yayoi and Yayo host a short corner due to a lack of money.

21.SummaryEnglish: Iori, Takane, and Yayo try and get Io to take a footbath.

22.SummaryEnglish: Due to a stingy budget, Azusa's gravure shoot is handled by Producer, Io, Takanya, and Miura-san.

23.SummaryEnglish: Whilst on another trip to the usual deserted island for Golden Week, Producer traps the idols and tasks the Puchidols with searching for statues of Haruka-san.

24.SummaryEnglish: Chibiki, Takanya, Io, and Miura-san search for the bronze Haruka-san statue, coming up against a large monster.

25.SummaryEnglish: Haruka-san, Makochi, Chihya, Afu, and Piyo Piyo fight their way through waves of enemies "Kung-Fu" style to reach the silver Haruka-san statue.

26.SummaryEnglish: Chicchan, Yukipo, Yayo, Komami, and Koami use their creative knowhow to reach the golden Haruka-san statue sat atop of a giant spire.

27.SummaryEnglish: The Producer reveals his motive for the challenges, prompting swift vengeance from the idols.

28.SummaryEnglish: Yayo and Io peform a comedy duo routine for Koami and Komami.

29.TitleEnglish: The Ultra Super Miracle Idol's Birthday
29.SummaryEnglish: On her birthday, Iori finds herself dragged by Yayoi to the Arctic to see the Northern Lights.

30.SummaryEnglish: Chihya is blown away by the wind during a walk with Chihaya, but is rescued by Takanya.

31.SummaryEnglish: Koami and Komami unsuccessfully try to play pranks on Piyo Piyo.

32.SummaryEnglish: Yukiho, Takane, Yukipo, and Yayo host a three-minute cooking show.

33.TitleEnglish: My Name is P! Tasting in the Name of Love
33.SummaryEnglish: Producer has to taste the botched bean sprouts that Yukiho made for the show.

34.SummaryEnglish: Miura-san warps Yukipo and Chihya to the Antarctic, where they come up against a hungry walrus.

35.SummaryEnglish: Due to a lack of sleep, Yukiho ends up talking to Miki and Azusa in spirit form.

47.TitleEnglish: A Tale of Once Upon a Time

66.SummaryEnglish: Ami, Mami, and Yukiho give Ritsuko a mystery game to play on her birthday.

67.SummaryEnglish: Ritsuko is tasked by Producer to search across the world for the Puchidols.

68.SummaryEnglish: Miki, and Iori follow Producer as he goes about his daily life, discovering his secret.

69.SummaryEnglish: Koami and Komami fill in for the Producer when he calls in sick, helping Ritsuko with a meeting

70.TitleEnglish: That is the Way of the World
70.SummaryEnglish: Ritsuko and Yayoi rehearse for a play under Producer's direction.

71.SummaryEnglish: The girls put on their performance with Haruka as the only spectator.

72.SummaryEnglish: Yukipo goes on her first errand, helped out by Chibiki.

73.SummaryEnglish: Ritsuko gets a little anxious about sending Yukipo on her errand.

74.SummaryEnglish: The Puchidols perform a concert, with the main idols serving as backup dancers.
